panels.description: BPF memory usage in the entire system including components not managed by Cilium.
panels.title: System-wide BPF memory usage

targets.expr: topk(5, avg(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_sum{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope) / avg(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope))

topk(5, max(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_sum{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope) / avg(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope))
sum(rate(cilium_kubernetes_events_received_total{k8s_app="cilium", equal="false", valid="true"}[5m])) by (pod, scope, action, valid)
